item.title: Install Soufflé on Ubuntu using Docker
item.description: What is Soufflé? Soufflé1 is an open source “state of the art” Datalog engine that uses OpenMP for parallelization in C++. It provides a compiler to translate Datalog programs into efficient C++ code, enabling Soufflé to handle large datasets while maintaining fast execution speeds. Soufflé also offers an interpreter for quick testing and debugging of Datalog programs. In addition to its core functionality, Soufflé offers several advanced features2, including:
